name: fromAtoB
description: Go from A to B, but there's a mountain in between...

name: winTheLottery
description: You win a lot of money, so you can buy hiking gear

name: loseTheLottery
description: You lose a lot of money, so you can't buy hiking gear

name: goForHiking
description: Hike over the mountain, only if you can buy hiking gear

name: hike
description: Hike over the mountain, only if you have hiking gear

name: goForTunnel
description: You don't have mpney to buy hiking gear, so go through the tunnel

name: getNoHikingGear
description: Option B: there is no hiking gear

name: goThroughTunnel
description: You don't have hiking gear; go through the tunnel
